item.description: Have you seen the Wolfram|Alpha iPhone app? Have you searched Bing and found a Wolfram|Alpha result? During our next meetup we will discuss the many ways Wolfram|Alpha has been integrated into technology. Of course, we will also be happy to answer any questions you may have about Wolfram|Alpha! Please come join us on February 11th at 7pm for great conversation with other users and delicious food.
item.name: Wolfram|Alpha Meetup
